description: En Translations for 'MSF Mental Health - MHPSS Baseline'

translations.How many people live with the patient: How many people live with the patient
translations.Total number of beneficiaries in family: Total number of beneficiaries in family consultation
translations.Main problem or reason for referral: Main problem or reason for referral
translations.Current symptoms or complaints (What is: Current symptoms or complaints (What is the patient reporting / what are you seeing?)
translations.Select the main problems prioritized as: Select the main problems prioritized as 1, 2 and 3 from the lists
translations.Important details of the main problem. H: Important details of the main problem. How long have they had the problem? (significant events etc.)
translations.Clinical diagnosis (only to be establish: Clinical diagnosis (only to be established by a psychologist)
translations.Did you have problems performing daily a: Did you have problems performing daily activities such as cooking bathing or chores outside the household?
translations.Did you have problems getting along with: Did you have problems getting along with family or friends?
translations.Did you have any problems sleeping such: Did you have any problems sleeping such as sleeping too much or not enough?
translations.Have you been bothered by unpleasant tho: Have you been bothered by unpleasant thoughts worries or ideas?
translations.Have you felt sad or nervous?: Have you felt sad or nervous?
translations.In general in the past week how well has: In general in the past week how well has the child been feeling?
translations.Did the child have problems playing doin: Did the child have problems playing doing chores homework or other day to day activities
translations.Did the child have problems getting alon: Did the child have problems getting along with others
translations.Did the child have problems paying atten: Did the child have problems paying attention understanding or remembering things
translations.Did the child have problems with his app: Did the child have problems with his appetite such as having too little or too much hunger
translations.Did the child have problem sleeping such: Did the child have problem sleeping such as sleeping too much or not enough
translations.Did the child complain about pain or dis: Did the child complain about pain or discomfort with his/her body
translations.Did the child seek comfort and closeness: Did the child seek comfort and closeness from someone
translations.Did the child wet the bed: Did the child wet the bed
translations.Was the child sad or irritable: Was the child sad or irritable
translations.Was the child worried or scared: Was the child worried or scared
translations.In general how helpful were the therapeu: In general how helpful were the therapeutic or counselling sessions FOR YOUR CHILD
In general how helpful were the therapeutic or counselling sessions FOR YOU
translations.PHQ-9 (only for depression) - Over the l: PHQ-9 (only for depression) - Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?
translations.Little interest or pleasure in doing thi: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
translations.Trouble falling or staying asleep or sle: Trouble falling or staying asleep or sleeping too much
translations.Feeling tired or having little energy: Feeling tired or having little energy
translations.Feeling bad about yourself - or that you: Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
translations.Trouble concentrating on things such as: Trouble concentrating on things such as reading the newspaper or watching television
translations.Moving or speaking so slowly that other: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
translations.Thoughts that you would be better off de: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way
translations.If you checked off any problems, how dif: If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people
translations.CGI-S score - How mentally ill is the pa: CGI-S score - How mentally ill is the patient at this time
translations.Positive functionality Is the patient ca: Positive functionality Is the patient capable of being independent caring for themselves (bathing/eating) going to work/school etc.
translations.Internal resources Does the patient beli: Internal resources Does the patient believe that they have the abilities needed to overcome the current problem / do they have hope for their future
translations.External resources Does the patient beli: External resources Does the patient believe that they have someone who they can rely on for help in their lives
translations.Spiritual / moral resources Are the pati: Spiritual / moral resources Are the patients beliefs a source of strength for them when dealing with problems
translations.Risk factors (in the last 6 months, exce: Risk factors (in the last 6 months, except for the last question)
translations.Has the patient had thoughts of death or: Has the patient had thoughts of death or suicide
translations.Has the patient hurt themselves / caused: Has the patient hurt themselves / caused self-harm
translations.Has the patient attempted suicide or tri: Has the patient attempted suicide or tried to kill themselves
translations.Is the patient currently at risk of hurt: Is the patient currently at risk of hurting himself/herself or attempting suicide
translations.Action taken to reduce risk of hurting h: Action taken to reduce risk of hurting himself/herself
translations.Is the patient currently at risk of hurt: Is the patient currently at risk of hurting others
translations.Action taken to reduce risk of hurting o: Action taken to reduce risk of hurting others
translations.Does the patient regularly use alcohol /: Does the patient regularly use alcohol / substances to become intoxicated
translations.Is the patient currently on psychotropic: Is the patient currently on psychotropic / psychiatric medication
translations.Has the patient experienced an act of ag: Has the patient experienced an act of aggression or violence
translations.Time between violence event and consulta: Time between violence event and consultation
translations.Would the patient like a referral to the: Would the patient like a referral to the medical department for treatment (or midwife/maternity for sexual violence)?
translations.Past / precipitating events (possible re: Past / precipitating events (possible reasons or causes linked to current problem)
translations.Select the main events prioritized as 1,: Select the main events prioritized as 1, 2 and 3 from the lists
translations.Relevant details of the past / precipita: Relevant details of the past / precipitating events
translations.Todays Session (what did you do today in: Todays Session (what did you do today in session)
translations.Homework (what will the patient do befor: Homework (what will the patient do before next session)
translations.Follow up session required (If no fill t: Follow up session required (If no fill the Exit form)
